item.description: 靜態網頁爬蟲 Cont. Bobson Lin 2020-01-10 Made with WebSlides OUTLINE Practice: Crawling Yahoo Movie Practice: Crawling Yahoo Movie Cont. Practice: Crawling Bank Exchange Rate Practice: Crawling Bank Exchange Rate Cont. Practice: Crawling Yahoo Movie Practice: Crawling Yahoo Movie Cont. ||| import requests import re from bs4 import BeautifulSoup max_page = 5 for page_number in range(1, max_page+1, 1): url = 'https://movies.yahoo.com.tw/movie_intheaters.html' payload = {'page':str(page_number)} resp = requests.get(url, params=payload) resp.encoding = 'utf-8' soup = BeautifulSoup(resp.
